channel.title: Polyamide Blog
channel.description: Mostly about productivity, physics and procrastination

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hi, it is late and I’m tired. But it really feels good to make the first post after spending one whole hour at making this blog happen.

Resolutions

This would be my list of TO-DO posts1 for the first week of return to blogging:

  • describe the sheer joy of purpose in using git 2
  • describe how I set up this blog by borrowing bits and pieces of technology available to me – some of them turned out to be quite interesting choices to make. The topics I can see right now are:
    • markdown
    • jekyll
    • github and github-pages
    • adapting a standard jekyll-theme (like me)
  • do a funny post about cats (sic Humorous)

Night night!

  1. I have been away from blogging for too long, the first few would be a bit techy! ↩

  2. atleast the subset of it that I use ↩
